154667:
Xenophobe visionary, 
Spare me from your missionary speech.
Nothing but hate for your kind.
Your life spent on converting the flock.
Why should I have tolerance
When this word means nothing to you
And your books, holy books?
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Religious soldier praying for a blessed kill count
That will lead his people to a false victory.
The antagonist, blinded by the faith he has for another great dictator
Just to know any success in killing.
Both sides are armed and ready for the next sacrifice:
A way used by those in power to hide economical interests under a crusade.
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Blinded by the shining light of the screen
This fake reality will soon be mine
As I look I just become more obedient to my master's will

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Prowling along the edge of misery
Suffocating on hope of better days
Questioning minds fed with the myth of opportunity

Born-dead: Death at birth
Unwanted: Still essential
Exploited: As they want
Born-Dead: But shall rise
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Face down. Obey to who is ordering: God and master.
Each one of us has someone to please
Work more, faster, the show, it must go on. Work more, spend more,
Happiness is one purchase away
We live our lives like if our condition would be just a phase
In wait of some kind of recognition that will surely not come
As for me, I had enough

(1409613209382)

This is the sound of human waste.
Worshiping the new leaders of destruction.

Spilling blood; this is the sound of human waste.
Spilling blood; no more pain nor hope - we don't care - the end is near - it's falling down.

This is life, This is pain.
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

The air is humid and the floor's cold. Prisoner. Crime unknown. Prisoner.
Awaiting my sentence. Society's disposable son. Outcast. Grown apart.
Institutionalized since day one. Society's unwanted son.
Raised by emotionless TV screen, this is everyone's crime.
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Wasting our lives digging our own grave. Greed lust…

The plot is simple and we shall be ending it. You find your power in our weaknesses.

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Desperate times
Despair pushed us on our knees

Bow down one too many times
Rising, rising
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Honour is at stake. Slave is my name. Honour at stake. Modern age slavery.
Living each day as the last of an existence deprived of meaning. Forced fed mentality.
Imposed value system. To accept our condition is to perpetuate the crime.
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Profit has no limits. The invisible hand, the icon, we now can put a face on it.
One day you’ll feel the pain you perpetuated all your life.
Business based on sufferance. The blood, the blood, the tears the torture.
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I'm sorry about the sun,
How could I know that you'd burn?
And I'm sorry about the moon,
How could I know that you'd disapprove?

And I'll never make the same mistake,
The next time I create the universe
I'll make sure we communicate at length

But until then, better off dead,
A smile on the lips and a hole in the head,
Better off dead, yeah better than this,
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Taken from the nest and programmed to obey. No hope. No faith.

Shall penetrate my shell. No hope of awaking a world hardened by centuries of oppression.

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

One more sleepless night. Cold sweat and nightmares waking me up.
Can’t close my eyes on this. One more sleepless night. Cold sweat and nightmares waking me up.
Can’t close my eyes on this world. Can’t close my eyes.
